item.title: Mac_xcode
item.description: Git is not working after macOS Update å‡ºç°ä»¥ä¸‹é”™è¯¯ğŸ™…ï¼š 1 xcrun: error: invalid active developer path (/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools), missing xcrun at: /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/bin/xcrun å‡ºç°é”™è¯¯çš„åŸå› The problem is that Xcode Command-line Tools needs to be updated. Solution Go back to your terminal and enter: 1 xcode-select --install After that restart your terminal
